snippet: Nearly two dozen videos from the Food & Wine Classic in Aspen will be shown online, in part underscoring the mayonnaise maker Hellmann’s pledge to switch to cage-free eggs by 2020.
abstract: Elizabeth Olson Advertising column notes nearly two dozen videos from the Food & Wine Classic in Aspen will be shown online, in part underscoring sponsor mayonnaise maker Hellmann’s pledge to switch to cage-free eggs by 2020; notes Hellmann's is a Unilever brand.
lead_paragraph: Nearly two dozen videos from the Food & Wine Classic in Aspen will be shown online, in part underscoring the mayonnaise maker Hellmann’s pledge to switch to cage-free eggs by 2020.

headline.seo: Hellmann’s in Campaign With Food & Wine Classic in Aspen
headline.main: A Backstage Pass to a High-End Food Festival
headline.print_headline: A Backstage Pass to a High-End Food Festival
